scripts.extbuild: rm -rf ./browser_extension && mkdirp ./browser_extension && cp -R ./src/public/* ./browser_extension && html-minifier --input-dir ./src/public/ --output-dir ./browser_extension --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --file-ext html && uglifycss ./src/public/style.css --output ./browser_extension/style.css && uglifyjs ./src/public/loader.js --compress --mangle toplevel,reserved=['baseUrl'] --output ./browser_extension/loader.js && uglifyjs ./src/public/script.js --compress --mangle toplevel --output ./browser_extension/script.js
scripts.build: npm run --silent prepare && npm run --silent extbuild && cp ./src/public/icons/* ./dist/public/icons && html-minifier --input-dir ./src/public/ --output-dir ./dist/public/ --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --file-ext html && rm ./dist/public/ext-options.html ./dist/public/ext-popup.html && uglifycss ./src/public/style.css --output ./dist/public/style.css && uglifyjs ./src/public/loader.js --compress --mangle toplevel,reserved=['baseUrl'] --output ./dist/public/loader.js && uglifyjs ./src/public/script.js --compress --mangle toplevel --output ./dist/public/script.js && uglifyjs ./src/modules/thumbnail-factory.js --compress --mangle --warn --output ./dist/modules/thumbnail-factory.js && uglifyjs ./src/index.js --compress --mangle --warn --output ./dist/index.js
scripts.dockerbuild: rm -rf ./home-tab-bookmark.tar && npm run --silent build && docker build -t dannystudio/home-tab-bookmark .
scripts.dockersave: npm run dockerbuild && echo build completed, now save to tar... && docker save -o ./home-tab-bookmark.tar dannystudio/home-tab-bookmark
